cloud_mining_hosting: TRONOKX offers reliable cloud mining and staking services, ensuring principal returns within 12 days. Our platform provides multiple VIP levels with varying deposit amounts and daily withdrawal rates to suit different investment needs:
cloud_mining_hosting_2: We are pleased to introduce you to TRONOKX, a cutting-edge platform dedicated to providing innovative cloud mining and staking services that deliver secure, reliable, and profitable returns. Our system ensures a principal return within 12 days, offering you the opportunity to grow your investment quickly while being part of an exciting, sustainable financial ecosystem.
cloud_mining_hosting_3: At TRONOKX, we offer a range of VIP levels designed to meet different investment capacities. Each level has specific deposit ranges and daily withdrawal rates, providing flexible options for users looking to earn daily returns from their investments. Here’s an overview of the various VIP tiers:
the_amount_of_vip1: VIP 1: Deposit range 10-1,000 TRX, withdraw 9% daily
the_amount_of_vip2: VIP 2: Deposit range 1,001-2,000 TRX, withdraw 10% daily
the_amount_of_vip3: VIP 3: Deposit range 2,001-10,000 TRX, withdraw 13% daily
the_amount_of_vip4: VIP 4: Deposit range 10,001-50,000 TRX, withdraw 15% daily
the_amount_of_vip5: VIP 5: Deposit range 50,001-200,000 TRX, withdraw 17% daily
the_amount_of_vip6: VIP 6: Deposit range 200,001-300,000 TRX, withdraw 20% daily
the_amount_of_vip7: VIP 7: Deposit range 300,001-500,000 TRX, withdraw 23% daily
the_amount_of_vip8: VIP 8: Deposit range 500,001-800,000 TRX, withdraw 28% daily
the_amount_of_vip9: VIP 9: Deposit range 800,001-1,500,000 TRX, withdraw 35% daily
the_amount_of_vip10: VIP 10: Deposit range 1,500,001+ TRX, withdraw 42% daily
the_amount_of_vip1_ann: VIP 1: For deposits ranging between 10 to 1,000 TRX, earn a daily return of 9%.
the_amount_of_vip2_ann: VIP 2: For deposits between 1,001 and 2,000 TRX, enjoy a daily withdrawal of 10%.
the_amount_of_vip3_ann: VIP 3: Deposits from 2,001 to 10,000 TRX qualify for a 13% daily withdrawal.
the_amount_of_vip4_ann: VIP 4: For investments between 10,001 and 50,000 TRX, receive 15% daily.
the_amount_of_vip5_ann: VIP 5: If you deposit between 50,001 and 200,000 TRX, you’ll be eligible for a 17% daily return.
the_amount_of_vip6_ann: VIP 6: Deposits of 200,001 to 300,000 TRX will earn 20% daily.
the_amount_of_vip7_ann: VIP 6: Deposits of 200,001 to 300,000 TRX will earn 20% daily.
the_amount_of_vip8_ann: VIP 8: Deposits from 500,001 to 800,000 TRX receive a 28% daily return.
the_amount_of_vip9_ann: VIP 9: For larger deposits of 800,001 to 1,500,000 TRX, enjoy a 35% daily withdrawal.
the_amount_of_vip10_ann: VIP 10: The highest tier, for deposits over 1,500,001 TRX, offers an impressive 42% daily return.
financial_turnaround: We also offer a short-term financial plan for those looking to quickly see returns, with the principal being returned within just 3 days. This plan is ideal for users seeking a more immediate financial turnaround.
periodic_financial_management: In addition, we offer a short-term financial plan that ensures the return of your principal investment within just 3 days. You can also earn additional rewards by inviting friends to join our platform. The referral program is structured across three levels:
periodic_financial_management_ann: In addition to these exceptional investment opportunities, we believe in the power of community. Our invitation rewards program allows you to earn even more by sharing the platform with friends and family. Here’s how our tiered referral system works:
the_unit_price_of_tron4: TRONOKX is designed for long-term sustainability, offering a platform that will continue to thrive as long as cryptocurrency exists. Join us today to start earning and grow your investment with confidence!
the_unit_price_of_tron_ann: Level 1: Direct referrals will earn you a 13% reward from their activities.
the_unit_price_of_tron2_ann: Level 2: For second-level referrals, you will receive 2% of their activities.
the_unit_price_of_tron3_ann: Level 3: Referrals from the third level will reward you with 1% of their activities.
the_unit_price_of_tron4_ann: This multi-level reward system ensures that your network’s growth directly contributes to your success, creating a snowball effect of earning potential.
the_unit_price_of_tron5_ann: The foundation of TRONOKX is built on long-term growth, and our platform is designed to sustain its operations as long as cryptocurrency continues to thrive. Our model ensures that the value you invest today will continue to yield returns for years to come. By joining TRONOKX, you’re becoming part of a community committed to creating lasting financial opportunities that align with the evolving world of digital assets.
the_unit_price_of_tron6_ann: We encourage you to start now, invest wisely, and take full advantage of the numerous opportunities that TRONOKX offers. Through cloud mining, staking, and referral programs, you have the chance to amplify your wealth and become a key participant in the world of cryptocurrency.
join_now_ann: Join us now and start earning today – the future of digital finance is here!
minimum_yeild_requires: Minimum quantify requires at least deposit
transfer_into_flexible_account: 1. Transfer into this account can be used to deposit money to earn interest, and you can manually receive the income 24 hours after the first investment time, and return the principal when it expires.
transfer_into_wallet_account: 2. Transfer to this account can be used to purchase regular products. Different products have different cycles and yields. For details, please refer to the product introduction.
you_send_virtual_currency_to_the_platfor: Using your digital wallet, you send virtual currency to the specified purchase address, and TRONOKX takes care of the automatic resource distribution. Our platform stakes assets within the TRON network to generate bandwidth and energy. These resources are then leased to partner wallets, and the rental earnings flow back to TRONOKX, which redistributes them to users!
by_sharing_the_agent: Step into the future of AI-powered finance with Chain Quant’s Global Agent Program—your gateway to long-term passive income through intelligent quantitative trading. As the AI trading market accelerates, Chain Quant is expanding its worldwide footprint by inviting marketers, community leaders, and forward-thinking investors to become part of our agent network. Enjoy a powerful multi-tier rewards system with 15%-2%-1% commissions, earning recurring income from both trading profits and referral growth. Every member receives a personal referral link, making promotion seamless and accessible to anyone—no experience needed. Whether you’re leveraging social media, private investor groups, or local communities, you’ll be backed by a high-performance platform and real-time auto-rebates. As your team scales, so do your benefits, with top performers advancing to City, National, or Global Partner status, unlocking 20%+ lifetime profit shares and exclusive regional perks. Join Chain Quant today and build your legacy in the new era of intelligent wealth creation.
when_the_cumulative_recharge_reaches: When your total recharge reaches 10 TRX or more, share your registration link on social platforms to receive a random reward between 0.01 TRX and 18.88 TRX. Each user can participate once per day!
tron_is_a_distributed_operating_system: TRON is a decentralized blockchain-powered operating system with its native cryptocurrency, TRX. Launched in 2017 by Chinese entrepreneur Justin Sun, it aims to foster a decentralized digital economy.
architecture_in_the_torn: Architecture: Within the TRON network protocol, TRX holders enjoy equal access to resources like bandwidth and energy. The network is powered by a decentralized virtual machine that leverages public nodes worldwide to execute smart contracts. With no transaction fees and the capacity to handle approximately 2000 transactions per second, it guarantees a swift and efficient network experience.
goverance_tron_online_community: Governance: The TRON community elects 27 Super Representatives through online voting. These representatives are responsible for block generation and verification every 3 seconds on average, forming a decentralized autonomous organization. They are re-elected every 6 hours and play a crucial role in managing network proposals and voting on TRON Improvement Proposals (TIPs).
advantages_usdt_has_always: Advantages: USDT is the most widely recognized stablecoin, and Tether has issued it across 13 blockchain networks, with TRON leading the charge, representing over 54% of the total supply. Ethereum follows with 44%, and Solana accounts for 2.7%, solidifying TRON as the primary network for USDT issuance.
bandwith_all_types: Bandwidth: Every transaction on the TRON network requires bandwidth points. Transactions are stored and transmitted as byte arrays, with each byte consuming one bandwidth point. The total bandwidth cost of a transaction is determined by its byte size. If a user lacks sufficient bandwidth, TRX must be burned to cover the required bandwidth points.
the_unit_price_of_the_targe: The official burn rate for bandwidth consumption is set at 1,000 SUN per unit.
energy_each_instruction: Energy: Every smart contract execution consumes a specific amount of energy, depending on its complexity. More complex contracts require more energy. As the contract runs, energy is calculated and deducted per instruction. If an account lacks sufficient energy, TRX must be burned to cover the required energy costs.
the_current_offical_unit_price: The official burn rate for energy consumption is currently set at 420 SUN per unit.
invest_in_our_basic: Invest in our Basic Account and start earning daily mining income! Upon your first deposit, you’ll automatically enter into a 180-day contract. The contract begins as soon as the first deposit is made.
earn_daily_between: Earn daily between 8%-36% of your cumulative investment.
incomoe_is_settled: Income is settled 24 hours after your first deposit (Example: Deposit at 3:00 PM, income available at 3:00 PM the next day).
you_must_manually: You must manually click to collect daily income.
deposit_funds: Deposit Funds: Start your investment by making an initial deposit.
earn_daily_income: Earn Daily Income: Enjoy mining income every 24 hours.
collect_income: Collect Income: Log in daily to manually collect your earnings.

the_system_will_automatically_upgrade: The system will automatically upgrade you to VIP2, and you’ll enjoy a 10% daily income at this level, and so on.

home_notice: Welcome to Tobbit – Where Smart Capital Meets Intelligent Algorithms. We’re thrilled to welcome you to Tobbit, your new home for cutting-edge quantitative earning. Whether you’re a seasoned investor or just beginning your journey into the world of algorithmic income, you’ve just joined a platform built for clarity, performance, and trust. At Tobbit, we don’t just believe in earning—we believe in earning intelligently. Our proprietary strategies are engineered by data scientists and financial experts to harness the power of algorithmic precision, allowing your capital to grow through real-time market opportunities. Every decision, every strategy, every return is powered by data and driven by our unwavering mission: to make advanced earning tools accessible to everyone.

chain_quant_description: Chain Quant is an AI-powered quantitative trading platform that blends artificial intelligence and blockchain technology to analyze crypto market trends and execute automated trades—empowering users to earn stable returns with minimal effort.
quantitative_arbitrage_trading:
Quantitative Arbitrage Trading
 – Utilizes price differences across multiple exchanges to generate low-risk profits
 – AI-driven systems track markets 24/7 and execute trades at ideal moments
ai_auto_trading:
AI Auto-Trading
 – Fully automated bots using pre-built strategies like trend-following and grid systems
 – Algorithms adjust in real time to limit risk and enhance returns
fund_security:
Fund Security
 – Implements multi-layer encryption with cold & hot wallet separation
 – Smart contract audits provide transparent and tamper-proof operations
instant_deposits_withdrawals:
Instant Deposits/Withdrawals
 – Deposits processed within 1–3 minutes (supports TRC20/BEP20)
 – Withdrawals are fast and automated—no manual review needed
multiple_trading_modes:
Multiple Trading Modes
 – Beginner Mode: Low-risk, fully hands-off trading
 – Pro Mode: Advanced tools and strategy controls for experienced users
how_to_register_and_start_using_chain_qu: 3. How to Register & Start Using Chain Quant?
sign_up:
Step 1: Sign Up: 
 Visit the official Chain Quant website, click “Free Registration,” and verify via email or phone
deposit_and_activate_ai_trading:
Step 2: Deposit & Activate AI Trading:
 Fund your account with USDT (TRC20 or BEP20)
 Deposited funds are converted into your Chain Quant trading balance
launch_ai_trading:
Step 3: Launch AI Trading:
 Click “Quantitative Trading” to activate your personal AI bot
 The system begins automated trades aimed at generating daily profits

start_your_journey_with_chain_quant: Start your journey with Chain Quant today and let intelligent automation work for your crypto future!
driving_the_future_of_ai: Driving the Future of AI, Big Data & Automation
at_chain_quant_we_harness: At Chain Quant, we harness the power of cutting-edge artificial intelligence, big data, and advanced automation to accelerate global digital transformation. Our mission is to empower organizations with intelligent, scalable solutions that fuel business growth and shape a more connected, efficient future.
ai_solutions: AI Solutions – Integrating machine learning and deep learning to optimize operations and maximize efficiency.
big_data_analytics: Big Data Analytics – Delivering powerful data infrastructure and actionable insights for smart decision-making and sustainable growth.
automation_integration: Automation Integration – Designing custom automation workflows that reduce costs, eliminate redundancies, and boost productivity.
strategic_industry_consulting: Strategic Industry Consulting – Providing forward-thinking, technology-driven market intelligence to guide digital transformation strategies.
innovation_driven: Innovation-Driven – We challenge the status quo and push the boundaries of what’s possible with technology.
client_centric: Client-Centric – Every solution is tailored to our clients’ unique needs and evolving goals.
integrity_accountability: Integrity & Accountability – Transparency and trust are the foundations of every partnership we build.
to_lead_globally_in_ai: To lead globally in AI and data-driven innovation, enabling SMEs to thrive in the digital economy while promoting responsible technology use and ethical transformation.
we_pioneer_the_smart_ecosystem: We pioneer the Smart Ecosystem—a blockchain-secured, cross-industry digital infrastructure that enables seamless collaboration, transparency, and advanced intelligence across global markets.

launch_announcement_prefix: We are excited to announce the launch of
launch_announcement_suffix: , a revolutionary AI-powered platform that is now live as of September 5, 2025.
platform_description: TOBBIT is is designed to elevate the future of digital asset trading, combining the power of artificial intelligence with lightning-fast execution. Crafted for the next generation of investors, our platform offers precision-driven tools to optimize crypto arbitrage and quantitative trading strategies, ensuring that your portfolio thrives in today’s highly competitive market.
feature_multi_exchange_desc: Connect effortlessly with leading platforms like Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, and others, enabling efficient trading across exchanges.
feature_realtime_arbitrage_desc: With millisecond-level responsiveness, Tobbit identifies and exploits profitable opportunities as they arise, ensuring you stay ahead of the curve.
feature_ai_autonomous_desc: Our platform is powered by cutting-edge AI, enabling automated, data-driven strategies with no manual input required, so you can sit back and watch your portfolio grow.
platform_mission: Tobbit is here to reshape the digital asset landscape, empowering you to trade smarter, faster, and more efficiently. Whether you’re a seasoned trader or just starting out, Tobbit unlocks a new realm of possibilities for maximizing returns.
platform_future_line: Step into the future of trading—where innovation meets precision.
agent_program_headline_prefix: Step Into the Future of AI-Driven Finance with
agent_program_welcome: Welcome to the next era of smart wealth creation. TOBBIT is proud to launch its Global Agent Program - a unique opportunity to earn long-term, passive income by tapping into the power of AI-powered quantitative trading.
agent_program_revolution: As the digital finance revolution gains momentum, Tobbit invites marketers, community leaders, and investors to take part in shaping the future of decentralized finance. Our agent network is built for scalability, flexibility, and profitability, offering an exciting way to grow your income while helping others thrive in the digital economy.
agent_program_income: • Multi-Tiered Income Potential - Earn rebates based on your network’s activities, creating a recurring income stream as your community expands. Your referral link makes it easy to promote, with no experience necessary.
agent_program_tools: • Comprehensive Support & Tools - Access cutting-edge platform features, real-time rebates, and AI-driven trading automation to make the promotion seamless and rewarding.
agent_program_growth: • Growth-Driven Opportunities - Progress through tiers (City, National, Global Partner) and unlock exclusive rewards, including lifetime profit-sharing of 20%+ and special regional privileges for top agents.
agent_program_closing: Whether you’re engaging through social media, investor networks, or local communities, Tobbit ensures that your efforts are rewarded. Start building your future today, and join us as we lead the charge in the world of intelligent finance. The future of trading is here. Tobbit invites you to be part of it.
cp_p1_rest: was founded in London, UK in 2025 and is committed to becoming a leading enterprise in the field of blockchain-based intelligent trading.
cp_p2_rest: is an advanced quantitative trading system powered by artificial intelligence technology. Its core capability lies in the automatic execution of trading strategies to maximize investment returns while minimizing risk. Specifically, TOBBIT transforms investment decisions into executable computer algorithms, enabling transparent, efficient, and rapid trading operations that adapt seamlessly to real-time market fluctuations.
cp_p3_suffix: ’s trading strategies are grounded in modern mathematics, statistics, machine learning, and continuous analysis of market trends and digital asset prices to determine the most effective trading actions. Through complex algorithms and modeling, the system evaluates market risks and investment opportunities, automatically optimizing portfolio allocations in response to changing expectations of risk and return.
cp_p4: This fully automated approach eliminates human error, enhances transactional accuracy, and ensures consistent adaptation to volatile and uncertain market conditions.
cp_p5_suffix: is a next-generation quantitative trading system that merges artificial intelligence with modern financial theory to automatically implement strategies aimed at maximizing profit and minimizing risk.
registered_office_value: 32 London Bridge St, London, United Kingdom SE1 9SG
welcome_title: Welcome to TOBBIT: Unlocking a Smart Future Together
balance_not_enough_recharge: Balance not enough, Please Recharge {{amount}} USDT
about_p1_tail: is a cutting-edge quantitative trading system powered by artificial intelligence. Its core feature is the automatic execution of trading strategies designed to maximize investment returns while minimizing risk. By transforming trading decisions into computer algorithms, it automates predefined strategies, making the trading process more transparent, efficient, and highly responsive to market changes.
about_p2_b: leverage modern mathematics, statistics, machine learning, and real-time analysis of market trends and cryptocurrency prices. These advanced technologies enable the platform to formulate highly optimized trading plans.
about_p2_d: utilizes complex models to evaluate market risks and identify investment opportunities, automatically rebalancing portfolios based on the expected risk–return ratio. This fully automated approach eliminates human error, enhances accuracy, and ensures the system can swiftly adapt to volatile market conditions.
about_p3_b: integrates artificial intelligence with modern financial theory to autonomously execute investment strategies—pursuing the twin goals of maximizing profit and reducing risk.
about_p5_tail: operates on a mutually beneficial business model alongside its users. All profits are generated through price fluctuations in the global cryptocurrency markets. The decentralized and tamper-resistant nature of blockchain technology ensures an open, transparent investment environment, offering users a stronger layer of financial protection.
about_p6_b: empowers users with a smart trading system designed to support consistent and sustainable wealth growth. Every transaction not only delivers returns to users but also generates platform revenue—forming a win–win structure that supports long-term financial stability for both parties.
about_p7_a: Let’s work together to drive the healthy development of the blockchain industry. With
about_p7_b: more individuals can confidently and efficiently master the principle of buying low and selling high through intelligent, AI-powered trading systems.
about_p8_b: has evolved to become even more powerful—offering enhanced features while streamlining the user experience. With a single click to “Start Quantification,” users can begin generating returns in just one minute. This is the future of intelligent investing.
